token.Paintball en Navarredonda. Para pasar un: Paintball in Navarredonda. To have a fun time this activity is available 1km from the village
token.Senderismo, mountain bike o en coche son: Hiking, mountain bike or car are perfect for the path to the Cervero's peak (1463 meters) and the Mora's cave.
token.Piscinas naturales en La Bastida y El Ca: Natural pools in La Bastida and El Carrero. Natural pools in unusual environments of the Sierra de Francia.
token.Parques de aventuras en La Alberca. Parq: Adventure parks in La Alberca. Adventure park, archery, mountain bikes and ginkanas.
token.Rutas en buggies y quads en La Fuente de: Buggies and quads routes in La Fuente de San Esteban and Escurial de la Sierra.
token.Zona impecable para ver las estrellas po: Impeccable to see the stars at the low light pollution area. In the mountains or from the garden of the house you will enjoy all the constellations in their full splendor.
token.Ganadería El Pilar en El Puerto de la Ca: Livestock farming El Pilar in El Puerto de la Calderilla makes available to bull lovers a fascinating experience, offering the opportunity to see firsthand the stunning beauty of the bull in the wild.
token.Ganadería de Toros Bravos El Pilar: Livestock farming El Pilar, fighting bulls
token.Salamanca: Plaza Mayor, Casa de las Conc: Salamanca: Plaza Mayor, Casa de las Conchas, the Cathedrals, Roman Bridge, Garden of Calisto and Melibea, and Museo Casa Lis among others (56 km).
token.precioso pueblo de media montaña próximo: beautiful mid-mountain village near Béjar (54 km). Ski resort of La Covatilla.
token.ciudad medieval amurallada con fabuloso: medieval walled town with fabulous historic center (64 km) .
token.pueblo de interés turístico próximo a la: village tourist attractions near the Sierra de France routes between oak and chestnut trees. Other nearby villages are Mogarraz, Miranda del Castañar and San Martin del Castañar (30 km).
token.famosa por sus monasterios e iglesias. A: famous for its monasteries and churches. Here is the tomb of St. Teresa (60 km).
token.Los Arribes del Duero y fortalezas de la: Arribes del Duero and strengths of the Spanish-Portuguese border (100 km).
token.Salamanca (a 56 km): La Plaza Mayor, la: Salamanca (56 km) : The Plaza Mayor, Casa de las Conchas, the Cathedrals, the Roman Bridge, the Garden of Calisto and Melibea, the Casa Lis museum and the area skewers Van Dyck.
token.La Alberca pueblo de interés turístico e: La Alberca tourist village in the Sierra de Francia routes between oak and chestnut trees.
token.Mogarraz pueblo de interés turístico en: Mogarraz tourist village in the Sierra de Francia. Narrow streets of mountain architecture. Museum portraits of Florencio Maillo.
token.El mirador de la Peña de Francia (1727 m: The viewpoint of the Peña de Francia (1727 meters). From the top, all the plain of Campo Charro is visible to the north, the Sierra de Tamames east, and Gabriel y Galán Swamp south apart from the rest the massif. They are famous the mountain goats at the top of the peak.
token.Ciudad Rodrigo ciudad medieval amurallad: Ciudad Rodrigo medieval walled town with fabulous historic center (64 km) .
token.Candelario precioso pueblo de media mont: Candelario beautiful mid-mountain village near Béjar (54 km), famous for the batipuertas.
token.El parque natural de Arribes del Duero e: The natural park of Arribes del Duero is a protected natural area. In most of the protected area of the rivers Douro and Águeda rivers make natural border between Spain and Portugal. The steep slopes of the area, the high flow rate of the Douro and the numerous rivers that flow into it, make the park one of the points of greatest hydroelectric potential of the entire Iberian Peninsula. Therefore, it has been building a network of dams, known as Saltos del Duero reservoirs.
token.Siembra y recogida de patatas tradiciona: Planting and harvest of potatoes with traditional donkey.
Traditional slaughter of the Iberian pig .
token.La casa rural Casa Salva forma parte de: The farmhouse Casa Salva is part of a family devoted always to livestock and agriculture for a living.
token.La base de nuestra ganadería son las vac: The basis of our livestock are cattle, but we also have Iberian pigs and chickens.
token.Las vacas pastan por los montes y las pr: Cows graze in the mountains and the prairies with their calves, ensuring the welfare of animals at all times. These animals live in extensive feeding on grass and natural pastures.
token.La inmersión en el mundo de la ganadería: Immersion in the world of farming and agriculture, a way to make it especially attractive for families who love nature tourism. And the Farm House Salva offers visitors the opportunity to engage in activities that will delight young and old: feed the cows, bottle feeding the calves, playing Iberian pigs, identify all plants and garden foods are some of them.
token.- Desde Salamanca, tomar la CL-512 (Ctra: - From Salamanca, take the CL-512 (Ctra Salamanca- Coria Hurdes) towards Vecinos.
token.- A la salida de Vecinos coger la SA-210: - At the end of Vecinos take the SA-210 (Ctra Vecinos) towards Tamames.
token.- En Tamames tomar un desvío a la izquie: - In Tamames take a left turn towards the CV-25 (Ctra Tamames ) towards Tejeda.
token.- En Tejeda tomar un desvío a la derecha: - In Tejeda take a detour right onto the CV-112 towards La Rinconada de la Sierra .
token.- Entrar en La Rinconada de la Sierra po: - Get in La Rinconada de la Sierra by Salas Pombo Street. The house is at number 20, just past the village church.
token.Semana completa hasta 8 personas (de dom: Full week up to 8 people (from Sunday to Sunday in high season).
token.: Semana Santa, Festivos nacionales y de: : Easter, national holidays and from July until the first half of September.
token.: Festivos no nacionales, junio y segund: : No national holidays , June and second half of September.
token.Ante cualquier duda con los precios cons: For any doubt about the prices ask the owner.
token.Oferta descuento del 25% para reservas d: Offer 25% discount for last minute bookings ( bookings with less than four days in advance) . Call a Monday to confirm reservation for next weekend and get a discount of 25% on the list price of the moment.
token.Excepto en los casos que el precio por p: Except that the price per person per night is below 10 € .
token.Hazte fan de nuestra página en Facebook: Become a fan of our Facebook page , brings 10 friends and follow us on Twitter, get one night free accommodation when hiring the weekend or 10% off the regular price of the weekend .
token.Oferta válida todo el año, excepto festi: Offer valid the whole year, except holidays and from June to September inclusive. Not combinable with other offers or promotions.
token.Casa Salva, La Rinconada de la Sierra y: Casa Salva, La Rinconada de la Sierra and its surroundings are a perfect combination to spend family days. We offer a family atmosphere and highlight as perfect spot for family vacations with children(pool, large garden, playground, swings and minigolf).
token.Visita la granja familiar dónde los niño: Visit the family farm where children enjoy a unique experience seeing and touching cows, calves and pigs.
token.Casa Salva es una casa de pueblo, rehabi: Casa Salva is a village house, restored and converted into an accommodation where you can enjoy the tranquility of the countryside with all comforts. The house is built with original materials from the area such as stone and wood, finally getting a typical of these lands of Salamanca saw rustic and rural atmosphere. Our guests can unwind by reading a book by the fireplace or can spend a romantic evening watching the stars from the garden or relax in the hot tub without leaving the room.
token.En Casa Salva todo está pensado para que: Casa Salva everything is designed so that our guests -our friends- spend a dream vacation in La Rinconada de la Sierra, a small town of less than 100 inhabitants located about a thousand meters on the north side of the Sierra de France (specifically in the Sierra de La Quilama).
token.A menos de media hora de La Alberca, La: Less than half an hour from La Alberca, La Peña de Francia and Mogarraz, essential visits with the natural park of Batuecas in the path of the Sierra de France.
token.Al norte está la capital de provincia, S: To the north is the provincial capital, Salamanca , about 45 minutes. Another recommended visit is Ciudad Rodrigo, the walled city or the Arribes del Duero, with its beautiful and grand dams (including boat trips). The area has a rich landscape: from the meadows of enzymes del Campo Charro to the mountains, valleys and mountains of the Sierra de Francia.
token.En esta zona se puede disfrutar de costu: In this area you can enjoy typical customs like the days of the slaughter in Guijuelo and La Alberca (in the winter). For lovers of skiing and snowboarding is the ski resort La Covatilla in the Sierra de Bejar.
token.En la montaña del pueblo donde se encuen: In the mountain village where is Casa Salva can enjoy picnic areas (El Carrero, mountain hike), many trails (route to the Cueva de la Mora or Pico Cervero) and natural pools to more than 1200 m (El Carrero and La Bastida).
token.Disfrute de una estancia inmejorable. De: Enjoy an excellent stay. Quality rest. Recreate it in the lovely setting of the Sierra de Francia. Quality at a good price.
token.Si quieres sorprender a tu pareja, te of: If you want to surprise your partner, we offer choices you sure you succeed.
token.Suite con televisión y bañera de hidroma: Suite with TV and hot tub with chromotherapy
token.En familia: pensando en la experiencia r: Family: thinking about the rural experience of children to grandparents
token.Este alojamiento está formado por una c: This property consists of a rural house of complete rent with excellent views of the Sierra de France. It has outdoor areas such as gardens, swimming pool, barbecue and playground for the little ones with swings and minigolf.
token.Tenemos cuatro habitaciones de matrimoni: We have four double rooms furnished with rustic brick, wood and mud. One of them has TV and ensuite bathroom with Jacuzzi (chromotherapy, 6 water jets and 12 air), shower and sink two breasts. In every room there are linens (sheets and blankets) and towels for all guests. We have a cot and highchair for babies.
token.La casa cuenta con cocina completa (mena: The house has a full kitchen (utensils, cutlery, toaster, coffee maker, etc.), dishwasher, refrigerator, freezer, microwave and hob.In a beautiful and spacious living room decorated with brick and wood we fireplace, flat screen TV (Smart TV) and DVD player. Two full bathrooms (towels, hair dryer and shower and tub).
token.En la terraza de la casa rural hay una m: On the terrace of the house there is a table and wooden bench, where both breakfast, lunch or dinner will make them special.
token.La casa cuenta con calefacción para todo: The house has central heating for the entire building. In periods of cooler it provides firewood for the fireplace and the barbecue.
token.Ofrecemos calidad, información y buen tr: We offer quality, information and good service to our customers.
token.Además de la casa y pensando siempre en: Besides the house and always thinking of the welfare of the guests there is an area of wide, comfortable and cozy leisure, cella, decorated in a rustic way where you can grill meat in the coldest days and have a good time. There is a free parking area, closed and easily accessible for two or three cars.
token.Hay conexión de banda ancha a internet v: There is broadband internet access via free WiFi. The owners are available 24 hours a day to any questions about the house or the environment. The garden area and the pool is exclusively for guests, only the entry to them is shared. There is a chicken coop in the vicinity of the house so the children can see the animals.
token.Aprovecha para tener una verdadera exper: Take the opportunity to have a real rural experience learning about life in a small town in the Sierra de France.
token.1. Las dimensiones de la piscina son 6,5: 1. The dimensions of the pool are 6.5 x 3 meters, has a maximum depth of 1.4 meters, it is fully fenced for the safety of children. The glass of the pool is surrounded by lawn, found around the shower, deck chairs and garden furniture.
token.3. Los menores de 14 años no pueden baña: 3. Children under 14 years can not bathe alone, they must always be accompanied by an adult .
token.4. El uso de la piscina es exclusivo de: 4. The use of the pool is exclusive to guests of the house and has no additional cost , so that the handover customers sign an exclusive owners of the house from any liability to a hypothetical document accident.
token.5. No está permitido comer y beber dentr: 5. You are not allowed to eat and drink inside the pool enclosure .
token.6. Es obligatorio ducharse antes de baña: 6. It is mandatory to shower before bathing.
token.7. El horario de piscina es de 10 de la: 7. The pool hours are from 10 am to 8 pm. Outside these hours it is recommended not to bathe as cleaning and scheduled maintenance are performed.
token.8. La temporada de piscina empieza el 1: 8. The swimming season begins June 1 and ends on September 30 , logically these limits shall be extended or reduced depending on if the weather permits.
